LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.0.label: 泌乳好奇
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.1.label: 泌乳興趣
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.1.description: I need to be milked every morning... I like this primal feeling of being a breastfeeding animal...
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.2.label: 泌乳戒斷
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.2.description: I can't imagine my life without milking... I must take care of those incapable of giving milk... Feed and protect them...
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.3.label: 泌乳渴望
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.3.description: Ohh, I want my breasts to be full of milk... I want to give it generously to those who suck from my nipples...
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.4.label: 泌乳激情
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.4.description: Giving milk is my primary purpose... I am a milking cow... and always wanted to be one... I am so happy to see my milk consumed...
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.5.label: 泌乳情慾
LanguageData.LactineLong.stages.5.description: I must be milked... I want to be milked... I want my boobs to be hard and swollen with milk all the time... so I can feed the others and see them being happy!
